sections.title: Borrowing Costs
sections.description: Checklist for presentation and disclosure requirements under IAS 23.

items.question: If the entity capitalised borrowing costs during the reporting period, does it disclose the amount of borrowing costs capitalised during the period?
If the entity capitalised borrowing costs during the reporting period, does it disclose the capitalisation rate used to determine the amount of borrowing costs eligible for capitalisation?
